attributes.action: Ensure all new arrivals in UK, except lorry drivers, quarantine within hotels.
attributes.additional_details: British people have complied with the lockdown and sacrificed a lot. However this compliance is undermined by the lack of border controls on new arrivals to the country.
attributes.background: Requesting new arrivals quarantine at home is insufficient to reduce the threat of new variants arriving from overseas, given compliance is not high. The red list of countries is insufficient given the lack of genome sequencing in other countries.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/570364

You could have a petition calling for lorry drivers to be excluded from all quarantine restrictions, if that's what you'd like to see happen.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/
